```{r,eval=FALSE}
#install.packages("mvtboost")
library(mvtboost)
data(wellbeing)
str(wellbeing)
summary(wellbeing)
Y <- wellbeing[,18:23]
X <- wellbeing[,1:17]
Ys <- scale(Y,scale = TRUE,center = FALSE)
cont.id <- unlist(lapply(X,is.numeric))
Xs <- scale(X[,cont.id])
res <- mvtb(Y=Ys,X=X)


# tuning the model
system.time(res2 <- mvtb(Y=Ys,X=X,n.trees=1000,shrinkage=.01,cv.folds=1))

system.time(res3 <- mvtb(Y=Ys,X=X,n.trees=10000,shrinkage=.01,cv.folds=1,compress=TRUE))
res3o <- uncomp.mvtb(res3)

```
